H0.text: what is the main source of nutrients in an estuary. Phytoplankton

H1.text: what is the main source of nutrients in an estuary. Seagrasses

H2.text: what is the main source of nutrients in an estuary. River runoff

H3.text: what is the main source of nutrients in an estuary. detritus

A4.text: Water draining from upland areas carries sediments, nutrients, and pollutants into estuaries

A5.text: A primary source of food for many organisms on estuaries, including bacteria, is detritus from the settlement of the sedimentation

A6.text: In both land and aquatic ecosystems, the role played by detritus is too large to ignore.

A7.text: The detritus cycle plays a large part in the so-called purification process... and an extremely important part in the breeding and growth of marine resources.
